t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: Amazon brings Amazon Clinic, One Medical under a single brand
s: Amazon One Medical now offers customers two ways to get convenient, high-quality health care: Pay-per-visit telehealth for 30+ common conditions (like pink eye, the flu, or a sinus infection), or Membership where customers pay a monthly or annual fee for on-demand virtual care, easy booking ...

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Whisper08 is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...

t: Amazon-and-One-Medical-Sign-an-Agreement-for-Amazon-to-Acquire-One-Medical - US Press Center
s: October 24, 2022 - Amazon will acquire One Medical for $18 per share in an all-cash transaction valued at approximately $3.9 billion, including One Medical’s net debt. Completion of the transaction is subject to customary closing conditions, including approval by One Medical's shareholders and regulatory approval.

t: Amazon Brand Registry: Protect your brand in France
s: Protect your intellectual property with Amazon Brand Registry using exclusive tools for sellers. Learn how to protect your brand.

t: Amazon has quietly launched an exclusive line of over-the-counter health products
s: February 22, 2018 - Still, branded products dominated every category except smoking cessation, according to data from Nielsen, meaning there's plenty of room for private-label drugs to grow. Amazon already sells branded OTC medications such as Advil, Mucinex and Nicorette, as well as options from Perrigo's generic ...

t: Amazon breaks into drug sales with Perrigo's store-brand OTC medications | Fierce Pharma
s: February 21, 2018 - online OTC drug sales OTC Amazon.com Perrigo Pharma

t: OTC drugmakers face an uphill battle on Amazon. But they should still be there, expert says | Fierce Pharma
s: November 19, 2018 - Over-the-counter remedies, which are part of many of Big Pharma's consumer divisions, are burgeoning on Amazon, so much so that Amazon quietly launched its own Basic Care brand line of OTC products last year, made by private-label manufacturer Perrigo.

t: Amazon Pharmacy | Online Prescription
s: Transfer or refill an online prescription or connect with a pharmacist 24/7. Amazon makes your pharmacy experience easier.

t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - New beta feature allows customers to use their Amazon Shopping app to complete purchases from other brand retailer websites if Amazon doesn’t sell the item directly.

t: AWS for Healthcare & Life Sciences | AWS
s: Learn about using cloud technology in pharma, biotech, genomics, and healthcare providers and payers. Incorporate innovations in big data analytics, high-performance computing, and machine learning into your organization with the AWS Cloud.

t: Amazon and One Medical agree to acquisition of One Medical
s: July 21, 2022 - One Medical is a human-centered, technology-powered U.S. primary care organization on a mission to make quality healthcare more affordable, accessible, and enjoyable through a seamless combination of in-person, digital, and virtual care services.

t: One Medical joins Amazon to make it easier for people to get and stay healthier
s: Together, Amazon and One Medical will help more people get better care, when and how they need it.

t: List of Amazon fatalities - Wikipedia

t: Amazon exclusively sells connected medical device brand focused on diabetes, cardiovascular disease | MobiHealthNews
s: October 30, 2018 - Developed by brand consultancy firm Arcadia Group, the Choice product line will kick off with app-connected blood glucose and blood pressure monitors sold directly to consumers.

t: The Life and Death of the Amazon Brands
s: August 15, 2023 - Dozens of house brands at the world’s largest retailer are going away. Consumers knew them but felt not particular attachment. Does it matter?
